original_text: A very large crowd spread their cloaks on the road, while others cut branches from the trees and spread them on the road.
korean_text: 무리의 대다수는 그들의 겉옷을 길에 펴고 다른 이들은 나뭇가지를 베어 길에 펴고

sentences.original_text: A very large crowd spread their cloaks on the road
sentences.korean_translation: 아주 큰 무리가 길에 겉옷을 펼쳤고

sentences.original_text: while others cut branches from the trees
and spread them on the road
